00070 static DdNode * addWalshInt ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode **x, DdNode **y, int n));

00079 
00090 DdNode *
00091 Cudd_addWalsh(
00092   DdManager * dd,
00093   DdNode ** x,
00094   DdNode ** y,
00095   int  n)
00096 {
00097     DdNode *res;
00098 
00099     do {
00100         dd->reordered = 0;
00101         res = addWalshInt(dd, x, y, n);
00102     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00103     return(res);
00104 
00105 } /* end of Cudd_addWalsh */

00131 DdNode *
00132 Cudd_addResidue(
00133   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00134   int  n /* number of bits */,
00135   int  m /* modulus */,
00136   int  options /* options */,
00137   int  top /* index of top variable */)
00138 {
00139     int msbLsb; /* MSB on top (1) or LSB on top (0) */
00140     int tc;     /* two's complement (1) or unsigned (0) */
00141     int i, j, k, t, residue, thisOne, previous, index;
00142     DdNode **array[2], *var, *tmp, *res;
00143 
00144     /* Sanity check. */
00145     if (n < 1 && m < 2) return(NULL);
00146 
00147     msbLsb = options & CUDD_RESIDUE_MSB;
00148     tc = options & CUDD_RESIDUE_TC;
00149 
00150     /* Allocate and initialize working arrays. */
00151     array[0] = ALLOC(DdNode *,m);
00152     if (array[0] == NULL) {
00153         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00154         return(NULL);
00155     }
00156     array[1] = ALLOC(DdNode *,m);
00157     if (array[1] == NULL) {
00158         FREE(array[0]);
00159         dd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00160         return(NULL);
00161     }
00162     for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00163         array[0][i] = array[1][i] = NULL;
00164     }
00165 
00166     /* Initialize residues. */
00167     for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00168         tmp = cuddUniqueConst(dd,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE) i);
00169         if (tmp == NULL) {
00170             for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00171                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[1][j]);
00172             }
00173             FREE(array[0]);
00174             FREE(array[1]);
00175             return(NULL);
00176         }
00177         cuddRef(tmp);
00178         array[1][i] = tmp;
00179     }
00180 
00181     /* Main iteration. */
00182     residue = 1;        /* residue of 2**0 */
00183     for (k = 0; k < n; k++) {
00184         /* Choose current and previous arrays. */
00185         thisOne = k & 1;
00186         previous = thisOne ^ 1;
00187         /* Build an ADD projection function. */
00188         if (msbLsb) {
00189             index = top+n-k-1;
00190         } else {
00191             index = top+k;
00192         }
00193         var = cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,DD_ONE(dd),DD_ZERO(dd));
00194         if (var == NULL) {
00195             for (j = 0; j < m; j++) {
00196                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[previous][j]);
00197             }
00198             FREE(array[0]);
00199             FREE(array[1]);
00200             return(NULL);
00201         }
00202         cuddRef(var);
00203         for (i = 0; i < m; i ++) {
00204             t = (i + residue) % m;
00205             tmp = Cudd_addIte(dd,var,array[previous][t],array[previous][i]);
00206             if (tmp == NULL) {
00207                 for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00208                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[thisOne][j]);
00209                 }
00210                 for (j = 0; j < m; j++) {
00211                     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[previous][j]);
00212                 }
00213                 FREE(array[0]);
00214                 FREE(array[1]);
00215                 return(NULL);
00216             }
00217             cuddRef(tmp);
00218             array[thisOne][i] = tmp;
00219         }
00220         /* One layer completed. Free the other array for the next iteration. */
00221         for (i = 0; i < m; i++) {
00222             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[previous][i]);
00223         }
00224         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00225         /* Update residue of 2**k. */
00226         residue = (2 * residue) % m;
00227         /* Adjust residue for MSB, if this is a two's complement number. */
00228         if (tc && (k == n - 1)) {
00229             residue = (m - residue) % m;
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233     /* We are only interested in the 0-residue node of the top layer. */
00234     for (i = 1; i < m; i++) {
00235         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,array[(n - 1) & 1][i]);
00236     }
00237     res = array[(n - 1) & 1][0];
00238 
00239     FREE(array[0]);
00240     FREE(array[1]);
00241 
00242     cuddDeref(res);
00243     return(res);
00244 
00245 } /* end of Cudd_addResidue */
00246

00268 static DdNode *
00269 addWalshInt(
00270   DdManager * dd,
00271   DdNode ** x,
00272   DdNode ** y,
00273   int  n)
00274 {
00275     DdNode *one, *minusone;
00276     DdNode *t = NULL, *u, *t1, *u1, *v, *w;
00277     int     i;
00278 
00279     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00280     if (n == 0) return(one);
00281 
00282     /* Build bottom part of ADD outside loop */
00283     minusone = cuddUniqueConst(dd,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE) -1);
00284     if (minusone == NULL) return(NULL);
00285     cuddRef(minusone);
00286     v = Cudd_addIte(dd, y[n-1], minusone, one);
00287     if (v == NULL) {
00288         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minusone);
00289         return(NULL);
00290     }
00291     cuddRef(v);
00292     u = Cudd_addIte(dd, x[n-1], v, one);
00293     if (u == NULL) {
00294         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minusone);
00295         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, v);
00296         return(NULL);
00297     }
00298     cuddRef(u);
00299     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, v);
00300     if (n>1) {
00301         w = Cudd_addIte(dd, y[n-1], one, minusone);
00302         if (w == NULL) {
00303             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minusone);
00304             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00305             return(NULL);
00306         }
00307         cuddRef(w);
00308         t = Cudd_addIte(dd, x[n-1], w, minusone);
00309         if (t == NULL) {
00310             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, minusone);
00311             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00312             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, w);
00313             return(NULL);
00314         }
00315         cuddRef(t);
00316         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, w);
00317     }
00318     cuddDeref(minusone); /* minusone is in the result; it won't die */
00319 
00320     /* Loop to build the rest of the ADD */
00321     for (i=n-2; i>=0; i--) {
00322         t1 = t; u1 = u;
00323         v = Cudd_addIte(dd, y[i], t1, u1);
00324         if (v == NULL) {
00325             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u1);
00326             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t1);
00327             return(NULL);
00328         }
00329         cuddRef(v);
00330         u = Cudd_addIte(dd, x[i], v, u1);
00331         if (u == NULL) {
00332             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u1);
00333             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t1);
00334             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, v);
00335             return(NULL);
00336         }
00337         cuddRef(u);
00338         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, v);
00339         if (i>0) {
00340             w = Cudd_addIte(dd, y[i], u1, t1);
00341             if (u == NULL) {
00342                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u1);
00343                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t1);
00344                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00345                 return(NULL);
00346             }
00347             cuddRef(w);
00348             t = Cudd_addIte(dd, x[i], w, t1);
00349             if (u == NULL) {
00350                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u1);
00351                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t1);
00352                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00353                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, w);
00354                 return(NULL);
00355             }
00356             cuddRef(t);
00357             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, w);
00358         }
00359         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u1);
00360         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, t1);
00361     }
00362 
00363     cuddDeref(u);
00364     return(u);
00365 
00366 } /* end of addWalshInt */
